item.title: Let npc talk loud!
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“hemmi80, post:1, topic:378995”]WHEN i try to do this

if (npcs[i].npcType == 219) {
			if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
				npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
				npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
				npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome.";
													}

And compile then this error comes can someone help me ?

#src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2777: class, interface, or enum expected
if (npcs[i].npcType == 219) {
^
src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2780: class, interface, or enum expected
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
^
src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2781: class, interface, or enum expected
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Welcome.”;
^
src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2782: class, interface, or enum expected

                            }

                            ^

4 errors

Press any key to continue . . .#[/quote]

item.title: Let npc talk loud!
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

hemmi80:

[PI] please help!!

ok well… go into NPCHandler and scroll down untill you find something like this…

                }
                if (npcs[i].npcType == 793) { // npc id
                    if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdate = "Enchanted Minigame!"; // what npc says
                    }

and change the id and what it says also you have to go into auto spawn and add the id to that too
